summary:
Opioids are powerful drugs made from or mimicking the poppy plant. They're mainly used for pain relief in medicine, like after surgery or for severe pain. However, they can also be used illegally for their "high." Opioids work by affecting the brain and body, reducing pain and often causing euphoria.

These drugs can be dangerous, leading to addiction and even death if misused. Side effects include itching, sleepiness, and breathing problems. With proper use and under medical supervision, opioids can be safe, but they are closely monitored due to their potential for harm.
title: Opioid
